comments.body: I play on Xbox bedrock, and I don’t fully understand this mechanic. But if I place a mob head on my head. I disappear from the map for other players. I know it’s not the total solution and if this works on ps4. But for now that’s all I can say about it.
That sounds kind of OP
MacchuPicchu96, I don’t think so. Every other edition of minecraft has a toggle sneak button. So, why not java?
Good idea
People have been asking for this for years. The code has always been there Mojang for some reason made the decision not to enable the button on mobile devices.
indeed must have!!

yea, that's weird if we must to buy realms to just export our world. Why this feature never been added for years? We need to use mod and now the new UI is making it more difficult to export. Why they haven't added it with this new UI?
I had this idea too, I hope it gets added because the inconvenience of having to transfer everything is annoying

Minecraft should start automatically backing up worlds to Microsoft Cloud for Xbox Live accounts! If Microsoft automatically syncs all worlds to the cloud, we could easily be play worlds on any of our devices. I could start a world on Xbox at home and continue it on my iPad on the train! Especially since Minecraft world upload to Realms is broken and we can’t transfer worlds between our devices!!
this would be nice
Great Idea! you should be able to tap the items in your touch bar on the mac!
Best idea i have ever heard as a suggestion to minecraft. Since it implements support for something that exists outside the game rather then a mob or such.
Good Idea.

So what your saying in short tearms you want Minecraft to add a bestiary for all the items mobs and enchantments in the game 

We need this

I hadn't thought of a bestiary. At first, it has been just to learn more about the origin of animals or plants that we could see in Minecraft, but your idea is very good. Below or above the descriptions of the blocks (plant or other) there could be the place where we have found them and where we can find them (like in other biomes that we don't already have been).

But for this to not to be too strong, at the start it could just record where we found a block, plant or animal and leave question marks in place of the biomes that we have not yet discovered and where we can find the block.
I think we should call it the minepedia. I think it should also explain in-game information about the item.
Yes we need this

This honestly kills any fun with experimentation with commands. You almost have to look up syntaxes for every command you don’t just know because even though I use a controller (no tab) I don’t know which parameter is next or whatnot. I have a whole world of command block shenanigans but it’s hard to want to mess with that stuff anymore without having to do a ton of guesswork (more than usual). The virtual keyboard also messes up sign spacing so you now just have to guess the spacing. Like what the OP said, a toggle would be great. Whoever wanted the virtual keyboard can still have it.
Great change

Actually being offline is only one cause of this particular error message. For sure the game should be able to detect if you are offline and not give you this message in that situation.

However, there are also many people getting "Account Error -9" when they are online and this is being tracked as a bug at MCPE-62421. There has been an upsurge in this on Android devices as Android has recently pushed its Android 10 OS updgrade and it seems that Android 10 doesn't like the way Minecraft implements OAuth. This points to "Account Error -9" reflecting an authentication failure due to Minecraft not being able to communicate properly with XBoxLive. This is really dumb as Minecraft, OAuth, and XBoxLive are all Microsoft products to my knowledge.
Thank you so much for the info and now I know why error 9 keeps popping up
I keep getting this message too but I am online. How do I fix this and access Marketplace again?
Hi
Bro like it says "ur minecrsft account idn't set up right" like wth am i suppose to do?!!
Agreed I was about to make a post about the same idea. Java players get f3 to pull up all of there info but pe players have to use outside sources like chunkbase instead.
Cool idea! But how about it is a special chest that uses redstone or some equivalent.
i would love to have this feature cause usually my chests are full of junk and can never find what i want
Why haven't they added this?

They should at least add something like button rearrangement because using the default button is just crap. I have controller tho but when you're outside, Im pretty sure you're not going to bring your big controller with you. Mojang please add more control customization in the mobile version.

Ideally the customization should be like those in fps mobile shooter games like PUBG Mobile and Call of Duty Mobile. That would make combat a lot easier. I know the game already has three control modes but that's still very lacking.
I agree, a few months ago, I also tried to find this feature but then I realized that it didn’t exist yet.

Maybe they could assign a feature where one of the F buttons (such as F4) could save the world around you and turn it into a panorama? Such as pressing F4 would capture the world around you, take you to the Mojang loading screen (just like when you change resource packs) and then it would set it as the menu panorama? This would be a great idea for people with really cool worlds with awesome structures so that they could remember them every time they log in.
I was just about to make my own feedback about this then I saw yours. this should be in the game i would also love it if you could upload your own panoramas for more customisation. mojang pls add.
Just bring food with you.

Being 200 blocks away from any source of food while in the middle of a building project is less indicative of a problem with the game and more indicative of a failure to properly prepare for the project on your part.

We both know that this idea is just not happening.
Good news! There's an easy way to solve this and that is by going into Peaceful mode. With that on, you won't have to worry about your hunger ever again. :D
Use creative... No hunger bar. Or use peaceful... the hunger bar doesn't work.

Unless in hard mode you don't die from hunger .you can use peaceful which has no hunger. Also creative. It's not about reward. In real life stronger you are the more you need to eat. Food is easy if you are that advanced and building doesn't use hardly any saturation so you should be able to build a lot eating . If not then you're doing it wrong.

There is definitely no way they'll be removing the entire system of hunger after adding many kind of food.  And the sprinting mechanic is only usable when the hunger bar is more than 6.  It's basically to make the game a bit more realistic.
The beta 1.8 update basically ruined the game. Personally, I prefer travelling via skeleton horse.

As a colorblind person, I would like to have colorblind mode.
Long overdue in minecraft.
I totally agree!
Agree other than the sheet music part maybe more like a piano as younger people might not have any idea where to start. But otherwise great!

The tempo should be controlled by the redstone connecting to the note block (the repeaters, usually) as it currently is in-game. The amount of time the sound of a noteblock is sustained for should be adjustable, though, and I would greatly appreciate that as a feature.

I thought this just changing the particle from a coloured note to it actually tone ig: F or g . It can also be seen as more considerate to the colour blind. The sustain and vibrato can be done with block for example for vibrato Place a stone cutter on top. But most of all just make them louder please there's no point I a door bell if the button is louder lol the note block has so much potential it would be a shame not to up date them
Moved to User Interface, Input Methods and Menu Options as it specifically calls out left-clicking (which is an interface thing).

Edited: I changed left-clicking to right-clicking, as I got confused because it's the opposite on the Switch version.

Also, thanks to inkycatz for correcting my other mistake!
Please make it so you can make them separate in the crafting table.

This was added in 1.19 but the carts can not be separated anymore in survival. It is possible to make command block chain to separate them, but that kills the purpose of survival.
Couldn't we just put the cart in crafting grid that it outputs a chest, hopper etc and leaves the cart in crafting grid, or vice versa?

I like this idea, It makes sense. Especially when certain console versions have such buggy launchers, which makes closing the game and starting it up again quite a hassle. With this feature that trouble could be minimized.
